script:
1). How come you didn't go to the leadership conference?
I came by train.
I went on a ship.
I was on a business trip. 
2). Her manager is Korean, isn't she?
Yes, I think she is. 
No he isn't. He's Japanese.
I'm certain she was.
3). Mark Jensen hasn't returned my call, has he?
No, not yet. 
That's right, he has.
He hasn't been here.
